docs.text: Installation To install Onepanel's CLI via pip : pip install -U onepanel Note CLI is pre-installed if you are using Onepanel's Workspaces. Tip The CLI is compatible with Python 2.7.x and Python >= 3.6.x, if you have both versions installed, you will need to use pip3 for Python >= 3.6.x. Checking version onepanel --version Help and documentation You can add --help to any command to view information about its syntax and options, some examples: onepanel jobs --help onepanel jobs create --help
docs.title: Getting started with CLI
